content: knitted jacket in drops air the piece is worked top down with raglan and double bands sizes s - xxxl drops design pattern ai-404 yarn group c or a + a **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250-300-300-350-400-400 g colour 10 fog drops buttons no 630 6-6-6-6-7-7 items **needles** drops circular needle size 5 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 5 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 16 stitches in width and 20 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
